content: World Peace through killing at random? Terrorists for peace? And what's that line at the end... quote: It is the truly educated who can read this, but it is the truly awake who can understand it. I can both read and understand it, but it doesn't make any sense. Killing the people of the world at random will not cause the people of the world to unite on a common front for peace. Fear will not bring world peace. World leaders will blame each other for these attacks on their citizens. There will be countries arguing about how to quell this "elite" murderous force where and how to find them and jurisdiction. Nice try, I agree with the whacko view more than troll.
